original_text: and who had suffered much under many physicians, and had spent all that she had, and was no better but rather grew worse.
korean_text: 많은 의사에게 많은 괴로움을 받았고 가진 것도 다 허비하였으되 아무 효험이 없고 도리어 더 중하여졌던 차에

sentences.original_text: who had suffered much under many physicians
and had spent all that she had
sentences.korean_translation: 자기가 가진 것을 모두 써 버렸고
